titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4810) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 103(a)(1) of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2001.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-726, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4810 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order. The amendment printed in H. Rept. 106-545 shall be in order without intervention of any point of order, shall be considered as read, and shall be separately debatable for one hour equally divided and controlled.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 253.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 545.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 407 - 16 (Roll no. 387).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/11/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4810 (budget reconciliation).
